sub_title: Senior Marketing Executive | Brand Builder | Innovation | People Development | FMCG | Latin America | Europe
summary: Strong brand building expertise (13 years) with track record of top & bottom line business results. Expertise built by doing marketing on different environments: Companies (P&G, Coca-Cola, KraftHeinz), Countries (Brazil, Netherlands, Argentina, Belgium, Chile, Mexico and Venezuela), Positions (Regional and Local), Categories (Soft Drink, Juices, Water, Sports Drink, Laundry, Coffee and Sauces) and Brands (Coca-Cola, Minute Maid, Crystal, Tide, Ariel, Heinz) coupled of International Experience (Netherlands and USA). I am driven by developing people, transforming complexity into simplicity and developing brands to meet consumer needs.
